name: pagopa-notice-pdf
description: Template for generating pagoPA PDF notices

scripts.generate-instalments: node compileHandlebars --templateFile template-instalments.hbs --dataFile notice-instalments.json && node generatePDF
scripts.generate-instalments-poste: node compileHandlebars --templateFile template-instalments-poste.hbs --dataFile notice-instalments-poste.json && node generatePDF
scripts.generate-many-instalments: node compileHandlebars --templateFile template-many-instalments.hbs --dataFile notice-many-instalments.json && node generatePDF
scripts.generate-cds-infraction: node compileHandlebars --templateFile template-cds-infraction.hbs --dataFile notice-infraction.json && node generatePDF
scripts.generate-cds-infraction-extended: node compileHandlebars --templateFile template-cds-infraction-extended.hbs --dataFile notice-infraction.json && node generatePDF
scripts.generate-cds-infraction-thermal: node compileHandlebars --templateFile template-cds-infraction-thermal.hbs --dataFile notice-infraction.json && node generateThermalPDF
